sources.title: Torture Ship
sources.description: A well known doctor is indicted for his experiments toward curing the criminal mind. Needing to continue his work and hoping that success will clear him, he buys a boat, loads it with several high profile criminals hoping to escape the law and heads out to sea. At least that's the plan, but things start to go wrong and things are revealed to be not what they seemed at first.

sources.title: Torture Ship (1939) HORROR
sources.description:
Stars: Lyle Talbot, Irving Pichel, Julie Bishop
 Director: Victor Halperin
 Writer: Jack London (story)

 A mad scientist performs experiments on "the criminal mind" on captured criminals on board his private ship. From the director of the clasic horror fllm WHITE ZOMBIE.

metadata.Plot: A mad scientist performs experiments on "the criminal mind" on captured criminals on board his private ship.
metadata.Writer: Jack London, Harvey Huntley, George Wallace Sayre
metadata.Actors: Lyle Talbot, Irving Pichel, Julie Bishop
